# Expertise

```{r radarPlot}

member_name <- "Wilfred Mijnhardt"
special_skill <- "policy analysis"

# OS_skills <- read_csv(paste0(getwd(), "/content/post/OS_skills.csv")) %>% # when testing
OS_skills <- read_csv(paste0(getwd(), "/OS_skills.csv")) %>%
  dplyr::filter(name %in% c("max", "min", member_name)) %>%
  dplyr::select(c(special_skill, "open source software", "data sharing", "data management", "reproducible analysis", "open access", "preregistration"))

# custom radar plot
radarchart(OS_skills,
  axistype = 0, seg = 10,
  pcol = alpha("#002328", 0.8), pfcol = alpha("#00B969", 0.6), plwd = 4, centerzero = TRUE, # polygon
  cglcol = "#7e7e7e", axislabcol = "#002328", caxislabels = seq(0, 10, 2), cglwd = 0.8 # grid
)

```
